titleStmt.title: His Grace the Lord Archbishop of Canterbury's letter to the Reverend Dr. Batteley Archdeacon of that diœcese, to be communicated to the clergy of his archdeaconry
titleStmt.author: Tenison, Thomas, 1636-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Lord Archbishop of Canterbury = Thomas Tenison.
